# Python 学习园

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/python-xuexi-yuan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/python-xuexi-yuan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install python-xuexi-yuan
python-xuexi-yuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g python-xuexi-yuan
python-xuexi-yuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
